name: Burger Master
description:
#granadajam

Now with keyboard support! 2 Players only.

Keyboard instructions:

  1. Player 1: Q (blue) W (yellow) A (green) S (red)
  2. Player 2: I (blue) O (yellow) K (green) L (red)
  3. For starting the game you can either click the screen or press the enter key
  4. You can click the menu icons for restartin/quitting the game
  5. Enjoy!

Game for the #granadajam made with Unity.

Artists: @alexaspa01 @MaralbaAlc

Programmers: @paco1305 @KelnStrike

Music: @Oli_mus

All Rights Reserved

This game was published in itch.io by our team mentioned above in the Granada Jam. The Granada Jam was done in collaboration with the GranadaJam association, Granada Gaming (Ficzone) and others
